title: COD RCG
description: Your essential toolkit for Call of Duty, featuring a random loadout generator and a 'Where We Droppin'' tool.

title: Royale Hub
description: An essential utility for Fortnite featuring a 'Drop Roulette' to randomly select a landing spot for your squad.

title: Off The Grid Field Kit
description: An essential utility and toolkit for Off The Grid, featuring a random loadout generator and an info hub.

title: Craft Random
description: A fun randomizer for Minecraft built with Next.js and React, helping you discover new crafting recipes.

title: Halo Infinite Hub
description: Your one-stop-shop for all things Halo Infinite, including detailed weapon stats, strategies, and more.
